channel.title: Air Alter in Varrock?
channel.description: I have just started to get back into RuneCrafting. Went to Falador, headed south to where the air alter used to be. After looking into Bots, I have found it was moved to Varrock. Anybody know the reason of this? I obviously missed the update on that one.

item.title: Air Alter in Varrock?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

riku9182:

The air altar was moved a LONG time ago

I think we have established that?

Read full topic

item.title: Air Alter in Varrock?
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

The air altar was moved a LONG time ago

Read full topic

item.title: Air Alter in Varrock?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:16, topic:353025”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=449339.msg3297494#msg3297494 date=1281043512]
Then perhaps it’s because you are getting more air runes because you are a higher level. At level 55 you are getting 6 per essence. But before that, you would have been getting 5 essence, which is 83k in 10 hours.
[/quote]

2 different accounts, Jmood123 and the one I currently have, at level 60 I was getting 70-90k air runes for every 10 hours when the alter was in fally, now I am level 64 on a new account and so far I am getting 100+k air runes for every 10 hours of botting.[/quote]I think you forgot what level you were when you were getting the different amount of runes. Because there no way that the tiny difference in length will give you even 10k extra runes.

Read full topic

item.title: Air Alter in Varrock?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Davidi2:

Then perhaps it’s because you are getting more air runes because you are a higher level. At level 55 you are getting 6 per essence. But before that, you would have been getting 5 essence, which is 83k in 10 hours.

2 different accounts, Jmood123 and the one I currently have, at level 60 I was getting 70-90k air runes for every 10 hours when the alter was in fally, now I am level 64 on a new account and so far I am getting 100+k air runes for every 10 hours of botting.

Read full topic

item.title: Air Alter in Varrock?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:9, topic:353025”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=449339.msg3297245#msg3297245 date=1281032899]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=449339.msg3297243#msg3297243 date=1281032837]

I can do about 100+k air runes a night when I use the varrock alter.
[/quote]It’s the same distance as the other altar to a bank…

I could only do about 70-90k when it was in fally.
[/quote]Lol… it’s the same distance. You probably just did it longer this time.[/quote]

No I run the bot for 10 hours, no more no less.

Read full topic

item.title: Air Alter in Varrock?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:11, topic:353025”][quote author=Kihomura link=topic=449339.msg3297284#msg3297284 date=1281034807]
I don’t see a point in moving the altar if it’s the same distance from a bank as before…
[/quote]Easier to find I guess. It’s also closer to the Grand Exchange, and the end of the Rune Mysteries quest.[/quote]
I think it is actually a small bit closer. Not by much, but it is, just doesn’t seem like it takes as long to get there. That might be what it is though, to help the noobies out a little.

Read full topic

item.title: Air Alter in Varrock?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I was doing Slug Menace and I had to enchant my special rune essence, and I went to Falador and was like wtf? Where is the altar? So I went to RuneWiki and it told me where it was

Read full topic

item.title: Air Alter in Varrock?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Found it by using the wikia change date and then just browsing the news archive:

http://services.runescape.com/m=news/advisors-and-objectives?allcat=true

They pretty much don’t state a reason but it was pointless. It was probably to help the new players find it easier, since they said it’s pretty much the same distance walking from a bank.

Read full topic

item.title: Air Alter in Varrock?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

If it’s XP you’re looking for, do the Z.M.I. rune crafting. It’s the best XP you can get until like level 91, or whatever double natures are. Just make sure you use Pure Essence and are on the Z.M.I. world.

Read full topic

item.title: Air Alter in Varrock?
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

Lol, I have no idea where the alter is to be honest with you. I use the abys at edgeville :D!

Read full topic
